title: Constructing Cu0/Cu+ interfaces on Cu-based MOFs derivatives to promote the adsorption stability of intermediates in the process of CO2 electroreduction to C2 products
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00466C, Paper
Jingwei Hong, Wanli Li, Jin Shang, Hiromi Yamashita, Yun Hu
Utilizing electrocatalysis to convert CO2 into high-value industrial raw materials can not only effectively reduce CO2 emissions but also achieve a closed carbon cycle. This method holds great potential for...
